N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 504.2 - Legal base

State Regulations
(a) Section
7.09
of the

Mental Hygiene Law grants the Commissioner of Mental Health the power and
responsibility to adopt regulations that are necessary and proper to implement
matters under his/her jurisdiction. (b) Sections
7.37
and
7.38
of the

Mental Hygiene Law grant the Commissioner of Mental Health the authority to set
forth a process for placement of individuals in receipt of transitional care
funding and to set standards which guarantee the right to administrative review
and a hearing regarding placements of individuals receiving transitional care
funding. Notes
